page.title: 18SURVEY RESULTS cont.
page.content:
7 get to work by rail. 22 by car and tube or rail. 12 get to work some other way.
We asked the people in the survey if they supported the campaign for an Ongar By-pass.134 said they did strongly, 49 said a little and 29 didn't at all. We also asked them what they thought about tipping at the LECA Works.140 thought it should be strictly limited,45 said it should be more limited than it is and 22 said it shouldn't be limited at all. The Epping-Ongar tube link has been partially closed and a full closure has been considered.75 people said a full closure would affect them while 134 said it wouldn't affect them.
